languages.text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если у персонажа есть оружие в другой руке, то, совершив критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} дуэльным мечом, он немедленно атакует ближайшего противника вторым оружием, применяя атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After scoring a critical hit with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least AP.

traits.locale_text: Если у персонажа есть оружие в другой руке, то, совершив критическое попадание дуэльным мечом, он немедленно атакуют ближайшего противника вторым оружием, применяя атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД.
Если у персонажа есть оружие в другой руке, то, совершив критическое попадание дуэльным мечом, он немедленно атакуют ближайшего противника вторым оружием, применяя атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}使用决斗长剑造成暴击时，如果装备者另一只手也装备了武器，则会立刻使用该武器，以{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}耗费最低的攻击，立刻攻击该名敌人。
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}使用决斗长剑造成暴击时，如果装备者另一只手也装备了武器，则会立刻使用该武器，以{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}耗费最低的攻击，立刻攻击该名敌人。

languages.text: 決闘の剣でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を出した後、使い手がもう一方の手に武器を持っている場合、その攻撃で最も近接する敵を即座に攻撃し{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が少ない攻撃を発動。
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 決闘の剣でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を出した後、使い手がもう一方の手に武器を持っている場合、その攻撃で最も近接する敵を即座に攻撃し{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が少ない攻撃を発動。

languages.text: Tras realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico con la espada de duelista, si el portador tiene un arma en la otra mano, atacará inmediatamente al enemigo más cercano con ella realizando el ataque que cueste menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tras realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico con la espada de duelista, si el portador tiene un arma en la otra mano, atacará inmediatamente al enemigo más cercano con ella realizando el ataque que cueste menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Nach einem kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit dem Duellschwert greift der Duellant, sofern er eine Waffe in der anderen Hand hat, sofort den nächstgelegenen Feind mit dieser an, und zwar mit dem Angriff, der die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet.
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit dem Duellschwert greift der Duellant, sofern er eine Waffe in der anderen Hand hat, sofort den nächstgelegenen Feind mit dieser an, und zwar mit dem Angriff, der die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet.

languages.text: Après avoir porté un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique à l'aide de l'épée de duel, si l'utilisateur dispose d'une arme dans son autre main, il attaque immédiatement l'ennemi le plus proche avec celle-ci, en ayant recours à l'attaque qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir porté un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique à l'aide de l'épée de duel, si l'utilisateur dispose d'une arme dans son autre main, il attaque immédiatement l'ennemi le plus proche avec celle-ci, en ayant recours à l'attaque qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, düello kılıcıyla kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yaptıktan sonra diğer elinde bir silah varsa onunla da anında en yakındaki düşmana saldırı yapar ve hangi saldırı daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcıyorsa onu kullanır.
languages.original_text: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
